resources.string: Monica Accessibility Service helps improve autofill functionality by detecting password fields more accurately.
Use your fingerprint or face to unlock Monica
No biometric enrolled. Please set up fingerprint or face in system settings
This device only supports weaker biometric authentication, which has lower anti-spoofing capability. Do you want to continue enabling fingerprint unlock?
Monica will create a secure password for you
Are you sure you want to logout?
Require biometric or password verification before accessing autofill
Automatically stack or expand based on card type
Merge duplicate entries from different sources in \'All\' view
Experimental: treat account as an independent login identifier; autofill account instead of email aliases
Prefer notes, then website, app, title
Analyze stored passwords to generate a similar and easy-to-remember password
Base32-encoded secret key, usually shown below QR code

1. Find "Two-Factor Authentication" settings on the website
2. Choose "Use authenticator app"
3. Copy the displayed secret key or scan QR code
4. Paste the key in the input box above
Counter increases by 1 after each use
Standard time-based codes, refreshes every 30 seconds
Counter-based codes, generates new code each time
Click the + button in the bottom right to add your first bank card
Show or hide this tab in the bottom bar
Use the arrows to reorder the tabs. Settings always stays at the end.
Choose which tabs appear and reorder them
Swipe up on the nav bar to reveal quick actions
Click the + button in the bottom right to add your first document

Includes all data (passwords, notes, images, etc.). Compatible with Windows and Android versions. Recommended.

Importing data may overwrite existing data. Please make sure to backup your current data before importing.
Supports CSV files exported by the app and Alipay transaction details
Imported data will be added to existing data, current data will not be deleted
Monica Password Manager is completely free and open-source software, with no mandatory fees. All features are available for free.
üôè If you find this app helpful
Feel free to support the author\'s continued development through the following ways:
Your support is my motivation to keep developing!
Thank you for using Monica Password Manager!
Hope it brings security and convenience to your digital life.
Storage permission is required to save images
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
Master password must be at least 4 characters long
Password must be at least 4 digits
Please enter your current password and set a new numeric password (minimum 4 digits)
Please set your new numeric password (minimum 4 digits)
Your master password has been successfully changed. Please remember your new password.
Password must be at least 4 characters
This will permanently delete all your saved passwords and reset the application. This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to reset all data?
All data has been reset. You can now set up a new master password.
Set up security questions to recover your password if you forget it. These questions will help verify your identity.
Please select the first security question
Please select the second security question
Please provide an answer to the first question
Please provide an answer to the second question
Please answer your security questions to reset your password
Too many incorrect attempts. Please contact support or use the complete reset option.
Please enter your master password to continue

View and manage passwords from multiple sources
Manage sync with Bitwarden and other services
Passkeys are a more secure and convenient way to sign in. When you create a passkey on a website or app, it will appear here.
Your device does not support creating passkeys. You can still view passkeys synced from other devices.
Passkeys must be created by websites or apps. Choose \"Use passkey\" when signing in to a supported website.
Full passkey functionality requires Android 14 or later. Current: %1$s. You can view synced passkeys but cannot create new ones.
More secure than passwords - resistant to phishing
Easy to use - just use your fingerprint or face
Create a passkey for %1$s to sign in without a password
Use your passkey to sign in to %1$s
Create passkeys on websites and apps to see them here
Are you sure you want to delete the passkey for %1$s (%2$s)? You will no longer be able to sign in with this passkey.
Category is inherited from the bound password.
No categories yet. You can create one in folder management.
This legacy passkey cannot be migrated to Bitwarden.
This passkey cannot be moved to Bitwarden.
Bitwarden action failed, item was not moved.
%1$d passkeys cannot be migrated to Bitwarden.
Passkeys are unique credentials. Copy uses safe move behavior.
Are you sure you want to delete this card?
Tap the + button to create your first secure note

The note you\'re looking for may have been deleted or moved.

Includes locally bundled icons from Stratum Auth app (v1.4.0, GPL-3.0). Brand names and logos are trademarks of their respective owners.
After changing the master password, all saved data will be re-encrypted with the new password. Please make sure you can remember the new password, otherwise you will not be able to access your data.
Password must be at least 4 digits
Your master password has been successfully changed and all data has been re-encrypted with the new password. Please login with the new password.
New password must be at least 4 digits
New password cannot be the same as current password
Set up security questions to recover your password if you forget it. These questions will help verify your identity.
Security questions have been successfully set up. You can use these questions to recover your password if you forget it.
Please select the first security question
Please select the second security question
Please select the third security question
Please provide an answer to the first question
Please provide an answer to the second question
Please provide an answer to the third question
What is your mother\'s maiden name?
What was the name of your first pet?
What city were you born in?
What was the name of your elementary school?
What is the name of your best friend from childhood?
If you find this app helpful, please consider supporting the author. Your support is the biggest motivation for us to keep improving!
Thank you for using Monica Password Manager. Your support means a lot!

Auto-fill passwords for apps and websites
Sign in to apps and websites without passwords
Monica can create and manage passkeys for websites and apps, providing a more secure and convenient sign-in experience.
Passkey Provider requires Android 14 or later. Your device is running Android %1$s.
Enable Monica as a Passkey provider in system settings
Passkeys use public-key cryptography, more secure than passwords
Sign in with fingerprint or face recognition
Sync passkeys across devices with WebDAV backup
Passkeys are bound to specific websites, preventing phishing attacks
To use Monica as a Passkey provider, your device must be running Android 14 (API 34) or later. You can still view passkeys synced from other devices.
Automatically fill passwords and forms in apps and websites
Monica Password Manager provides secure autofill for your passwords
Delete all passwords, authenticators, bank cards and documents
This will permanently delete all passwords, authenticators, bank cards and documents, and cannot be recovered.\n\nIt is recommended to export a backup before clearing!

Autofill requires Android 8.0 or higher. Once enabled, Monica will automatically fill saved passwords when you visit apps and websites.
Monica is set as default autofill service
Please enable Monica in system settings
Please enable Monica as autofill service in system settings

Used for: Saving exported data and images

To revoke this permission, go to Settings > Apps > Monica > Permissions
Tap to open system settings and grant this permission

This screen shows all permissions used by Monica. Tap on a permission to manage it in system settings.

‚Ä¢ Required: Essential for core functionality
‚Ä¢ Recommended: Enhances user experience
‚Ä¢ Optional: For additional features
Here you can view all permissions used by Monica and their current status. Tap any permission to manage it in system settings.

Include recycle bin, password generator history, and operation history
Include all local KeePass databases (both internal and external). Restored as internal storage databases.

Include WebDAV server address, credentials and settings for easy setup on new devices. Only restored when local WebDAV is not configured.

%1$s

Note: this imports all data in this backup into the current app.
Deduplicate only against Monica local data
Off: keep old behavior (global dedup across all data). On: only dedup with local entries.
This backup file is encrypted. Enter password to decrypt:
KeePassDX-like behavior: use conditional write when possible, otherwise best-effort save.
Require server-side conflict metadata; safer but may block writes on some WebDAV servers.
Strict mode: blocks writes if ETag is missing or the remote file changed.
Auto mode (recommended): uses If-Match when ETag exists; otherwise falls back to best-effort overwrite.
Create an empty KeePass database on your WebDAV server.
A database with the same name already exists
Select a remote .kdbx file below to attach for direct read/write.
This will force-push local data to WebDAV and overwrite the remote file. Remote changes not in local data will be lost.
This remote database is not attached yet
